block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 检查连接最方便的方法是单击此块 这实际上是使用引脚 2 来打开/关闭内置 LED 的数字输出 它将以 0.5 秒的开/关间隔闪烁 5 秒 most convenient method to check for connection is to click on this block this is actually digital output using pin 2 to turn ON/OFF the built-in LED it will blink for 5s at ON/OFF interval of 0.5s
可以使用此块设置数字输出 0：输出设置为低 1：输出设置为高 Digital Output can be set using this block 0 : output set to LOW 1 : output set to HIGH

这是数字输出图块 有 2 个下拉列表供用户选择 第一个是引脚 - 所有引脚号都在这里 第二个是输出设定值 This is the digital output block there is 2 drop down list for user to select from 1st is the pin - all the pin numbers is available here 2nd is the output set value
闪烁 LED 图块用于闪烁内置 LED A blink LED block to blink built-in LED
可以右键单击此块并选择编辑以查看里面的实际 Snap！图块 Can right click on this block and select edit to see the actual Snap! blocks inside
可以再次右键单击我们想要的部分并选择复制以复制该图块并将其粘贴到外面进行编辑/测试 Can right click again on the portion we want and select duplicate to make a copy of the block to paste outside for editing/testing
